name: Fabgit
tagline: Git is Awesome, but it can be FABULOUS!
body: fabgit ====== Because Git is awesome, but it can be FABULOUS! fabgit uses the amazing whatthejeff/fab library. You can use it in the same way you use composer - save the phar file it to your /usr/bin as 'fabgit' and it shall be available system-wide, or use as php fabgit.phar [your git commands] Installation ======== You only need the fabgit.phar file. `sudo cp fabgit.phar /usr/sbin/fabgit` And it shall be available globally. `fabgit`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
